website_summaries.verdict: This 5-brush holder serves as a toothbrush storage and cleaner.
pros: If you're looking for a toothbrush UV cleaner that saves you a bit of counter space, this wall-mounted design is your best option
With the ability to hold and clean 5 brushes at once, this easy-to-install cleaner is good for any bathroom with several toothbrushes
Includes a drying function, and cleans brushes in 8 minutes
cons: Frequent charging can be tiresome, and the UV lights may not last too long

customer_reviews.title: Great holder great thought
customer_reviews.text: I am so satisfy with this great holder. We as a family loved it. It encourages my little one to brush theor teeth. It is both fancy and good quality. It has a little fan at the side and the iltra violet light is expected to sanitized. I am not a profession but thats what it says. The holder has a inbuilt battery so even the lights the electric out the sytem is still working. There is a small button at the top to activate. It has a timer in it so it stops it self. You may use it as brusing timer. It really great tool. I strongly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ike Fydone

customer_reviews.title: Sanitizes, dries and stores your toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really awesome. It was very easy to install - I use it for my son's toothbrush and I like that it not only sterilizes it, but it also dries it and keeps it covered. The fan is not too loud, either. It has a blue light on the top that I like because it lights up the bathroom just enough to see during the night without having to turn the main light on.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M

customer_reviews.title: The drying feature is really great!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this device. I normally clean my families toothbrushes a couple times a week with a white vinegar and hydrogen peroxide soak. This device is great because it has a fan to dry the toothbrushes and UV light for germs. Not sure if UV actually works or not for germs. I bought it mostly for the drying feature and it keeps the brushes and toothpaste tidy in the bathroom while providing a door on the front to help protect the brushes for other germs in the bathroom. I would definitely buy this again in the future and maybe for gifts for family.
customer_reviews.author: Coty

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: Completely unusable product; unsafe waste of money. Didn’t know until received that the sanitizing light is a MERCURY light, not recommended for sanitizing something you put in your mouth. MERCURY, A deadly poison, can escape if the bulb ruptures which apparently isn’t that uncommon. As far as I can tell these shouldn’t be in the US market.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: This easily holds both mine and my partner's electric toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: While I don't have a lab to measure bacterial cultures, this product really seems to work in our household. I had no difficulty mounting or using it. This easily holds both mine and my partner's electric toothbrush, heavy handle and all, in addition to our family's manual brushes. We feel more secure knowing that it keeps our toothbrushes clean. It is inconvenient to charge in my bathroom without any outlets, but thankfully is not too difficult to remove from its wallplate to accomplish this, and holds a charge for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Vee

customer_reviews.title: I waited before leaving review
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I'm very happy with the performance of this product. My only issue, and is not big enough to take a away a star, is that the power supply and the charging cable are black. It doesn't make sense, since the product is white. I feel like the went with a generic version and makes it look cheap. Since my bathroom is all white, I have to keep plugging and unplugging since I don't want the eye sore. I will try to find a white one at some point. Super easy to use and solves a pretty nasty issue.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Velloso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is super handy and easy to install! Works wonders! Super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The holder was very easy to install. We used the adhesive strip to attach it to our mirror. The charge last about 12-15 uses and it takes a few hours to charge it backup. My only complaint is my wife uses an inexpensive battery operated toothbrush. It does not fit in the holders very well, but we are able to get it in there enough to close the lid so it will come on. If they had different size options in the holder section, that would be perfect. It's a great little sterilizer for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Millers

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about the tootbrush holder I was eying this product on the site for a long time. Well when i received the product it hung up well no problems. the problem I have the tooth paste holder sucks it drip out all my tooth paste over the wall which cause a bit mess to clean up. the UV lights does not work, I charge the unit for the recommend time,and it does nothing. the blue light does not even come on. I am going to see if i can send this product back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: KI

customer_reviews.title: doesn't fit Oral B electric toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: doesn't fit my Oral B, which I believe is the most common type of electric toothbrush :(
customer_reviews.author: sh

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made product
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased one of these “toothbrush Sanitizers” and it worked for (1) one month then stopped. So I bought a second one and that one “never” worked at all. Oh yeah when you plug it in the blue light goes on but it doesn’t charge the unit. This product should be removed and all future sales of it should be suspended to avoid more inconvenience to more customers.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Aiellos

customer_reviews.title: not safe from bugs
customer_reviews.text: I had always wondered if bugs were on my toothbrush while in the enclosure until one day I actually found one... disgusting! I live in Hawaii where no matter what you do there are bugs around. They should have enclosed this to keep bugs out except it is wide open underneath. I've already bought a different model where the tooth brushes are safe from things that crawl. A roach could have been all over your brush and you didn't even know it, unhealthy
customer_reviews.author: Kauai 411

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMENDED!!
customer_reviews.text: i have to change my review because you have to leave the button on for a long time for the light to come on. I thought it doesnt work because the light doesnt come on as soon as you turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: suzy kim

customer_reviews.title: Great but our door broke
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product at first. It worked great and seemed to be exactly as described but after a few weeks of use, one of the tabs on the door broke off so it doesn't run anymore. It is within the return window so we are exchanging it for another one because we liked it so much, we are willing to give it another shot. I like the peace of mind that they are being sanitized nightly, especially this time of year when colds and different germs run rampant!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is what I am looking for in a toothbrush sanitizer and toothbrush holder together. Best of all installation was easy and it really looks good in my bathroom, color is matching.
customer_reviews.author: Be water

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: Arrived clearly used. Previous user included the old used adhesion pad with paint stuck to it. Because this is for toothbrushes it’s gross to resell a used product. Checked to see if this would work on our wall. The charger cord plugs in on the left side and is short which doesn’t work well in our bathroom setup.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing... wish I hadn’t waited so long to buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. For years I’ve tried to find something to store my kids toothbrushes where they stay clean (not sitting out) but without collecting water and getting gross. This not only holds and protects them, but also does a sanitizing cycle. We chose not to put the flower sticker on it just because thst wasn’t our style so it can also be plain white.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but too delicate
customer_reviews.text: The unit was easy to install on the mirror, but the double-sided tape that was provided let go after a few weeks. This was easy to fix with a little Gorilla Glue. Later, one of my pre-teen sons carelessly over-extended the the door and broke the tabs that attach it to the body. I tried several ways to fix it, but the fix never lasts, making the unit useless. If only adults use it, this should not be a problem. I find the battery unnecessary. It lasts less than a week. I just leave the unit plugged in all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Cacrna

customer_reviews.title: Good toothbrush holder...helps kids put toothbrushes back and they hopefully stay clean!
customer_reviews.text: My kids can't keep track of their toothbrushes so I bought this so they might have an incentive to keep track of them and they will stay clean. It was super easy to install. I like that it stores up to 5 toothbrushes. It turns on and functions as advertised. It's nice having my kids toothbrushes off a dirty counter or other places they get put. I like the idea that it sterilizes and I'm just hoping it really does as I don't have the means to test that.
customer_reviews.author: Blanche

customer_reviews.title: The simplest things in life bring the most joy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because, you know, poop molecules. Also I'm a dentist, so I see a lot in the world... It was easy to put up on the mirror and hasn't loosened yet. I put mine and my husband's toothbrush and my tongue scraper and there's probably room for another tongue scraper. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Akshi

customer_reviews.title: Great until it falls off the wall
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these. I have the same complaint about both. They adhere for a time and then they fall off of whatever you've adhered them to. At a certain point in falling the door will open and it will break, and then this is essentially useless. The first time I purchased it about six months passed before any difficulties; my latest purchase lasted roughly two months. I expect if I purchase another it will last a few weeks at most.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Ok holder
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrush holder and dryer but it does very quickly! We only use the drying function twice a day and it dies within two days of use. We mainly got it just to hold our toothbrushes so I can complain too much though. Also if you have an oral b electric toothbrush when you close the lid it pushes the toothbrush into the wall and almost doesn’t close. Any other toothbrush and your fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed but so far so good. So easy and awesome for our small bathroom. Gets the kids to put the brushes back in vs sitting on the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Gibs

customer_reviews.title: Best toothbrush sanitizer so far...
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting anxiously for this item! Makes very little noise, easy to install. I just hope it doesn’t fall down with weight of the sonicare toothbrush. It’s only 3 of us for the space of 5 toothbrushes. It’s not as big as I thought it would be but it’s a good size for my small bathroom space. I even put the tongue scraper on the little space at the top. I have space on my sink again. I love it so far, for the first day!
customer_reviews.author: Oviedo

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I liked the thought of what this product should do, however, that is not the reality.our toothbrushes apparently never get dry, because I just found mold on the inside where out toothbrush heads go. I wet a toothbrush and ran the system to find out the reasoning behind the mold and the toothbrushes were stopping wet. Not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first month then nothing. It would not charge and I was passed the return window. Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: RobinFromCle

customer_reviews.title: A bit more sanitary
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in hopes it would sanitize my toothbrushes. The toothpaste holder is just that. Holds your toothpaste. You still need to squeeze the toothpaste to get it out. There is also a fan to dry the toothbrush. It does cause a weird stench on the toothbrushes, but that could just be my breath lol TrUst mE!
customer_reviews.author: Trust Me

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very hygienic and easy to maintain. It helps to keep my brush safe from any type of contamination (specially my little kid teeth brush that I try to be very careful where it ends after using it.)
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this few days ago and suddenly it stop working. Something is wrong with it. I was expecting this within few days. I got damaged or low quality of product.
customer_reviews.author: Kinzz

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service !
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and stylish, very handy when you don’t have enough counter space in your bathroom. The adhesive is strong. For some reason it stopped working. But I contacted the seller and he quickly responded and he is sending me another one ! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: -concept was exactly what I was looking for I wanted as little stuff on our bathroom sink BONUS: being it holds the toothpaste too -not to bulky -I’ve received many compliments -easy to install, easy to use -overall very happy -Only dislike is it doesn’t hold charge very long
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying a UV toothbrush sanitizer. I'm HOOKED! My toothbrush has a clean feel to it that toothbrush covers do not provide. This sanitizer sanitzes itself. When the toothbrush is taken out, the UV light comes on to sanitize the case. I’m a germaphobe and now this gives me a piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit most toothpaste tubes
customer_reviews.text: The hole for the toothpaste is very gimmicky. It's too narrow to fit most standard tubes. That said, it's easy to install and I like the features. Charging the item can be a bit of a pain, so try to keep this near an outlet to avoid removing it from the wall all the time to charge.
customer_reviews.author: trevor

customer_reviews.title: Content with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Came as described. Works well so far. The fan makes noise but nothing too loud or unpleasant. The stickys use to place item on wall worked out well, glad I didn't have to use screws or nails to hold up. Toothpaste squeezer has to be at an angle to slide down toothpaste. Great little add on. Item does not come with charging box, only USB. Overall I'm happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmín

customer_reviews.title: Was great until the bulb broke
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine, then one day I noticed the bulb had cracked in half. No more UV sanitizer. Worse, I can't figure out how to remove the broken bulb
customer_reviews.author: Talky McPersonface

customer_reviews.title: Great buy toothbrush sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: My wife really love this toothbrush sterilizer. Definitely a great buy. Easy sterilize process. Use your toothbrush as normal, put it back to the sterilizer, close the cover, turn it on by pressing the only button on top. It will timely sterilize it and turn off by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Pristar

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's good. The only trouble is sometimes your toothbrush will turn when you close the door if it's a bit big, so you may have to mess with it a bit... But it is minor. I also installed it at a height that let's my wife's electric brush still sit on its charger base and be inside, too.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Fails to activate
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this unit because the UV light seldom comes on... Usually I have to restart it several times before the light activates and even then it refuses to at times.. not reliable
customer_reviews.author: T Bird

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It cleaned up my toothbrush drawer problem. No more sticky trays with germy wet toothbrushes piled on top of each other! It's easy to hang the toothbrushes - regular and electric, and the toothpaste fits nicely. With a push of a button, they're getting dried and sanitized (hopefully) too.
customer_reviews.author: AliBen

customer_reviews.title: NOT a toothpaste DISPENSER
customer_reviews.text: NOT a toothpaste dispenser. May look like one, may come up on the first recommend items when you look up “dispenser” on search tab, but this is only UV and toothpaste/ toothbrush HOLDER. I am so mad for not reading all description info. Otherwise easy to install and the UV seem to be working fine, just larger electric toothbrushes do not properly fit
customer_reviews.author: ELENA

customer_reviews.title: great purchase but didnt stick.
customer_reviews.text: i bought this because we removed our medicine cabinet and wanted something nice because the toothbrushes would be exposed. it works great, is quiet and easy to install. the adhesive does not stick to my wall which is why in the picture you dont see it and there is a blank spot. it falls off. it was hard to figure out how to put the plastic bar that the adhesive goes onto on the device too. the holder goes in the bottom left hand corner when it is sticking up there. i will have to put some command tape on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is ok!
customer_reviews.text: The toothpaste doesn't fit in the holder. I'm not really sure if it really sanitized my toothbrush. I just use it as a toothbrush holder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good product. Adhesive cane off wall the same day I installed. And I did use alcohol to clean wall first. It stopped working after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Kaje

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product and looks good in my bathroom. I love how it totally encapsulates the toothbrush head. When people visit they always comment on it. It has 5 spots but for me i am only able to use 4 spots because of the way it was made. I like how it has a spot for your toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great and near perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product has been doing very well and seems to serve its purpose. Dries and sanitizes my toothbrush! Not only that, but it also fits my tongue scraper as well. The only downside I have to say is that I wish the toothpaste portion had a better use or something
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great customer service. One of the Sticky tabs that hold the unit to whatever surface you put it on broke when my daughter tried to get her toothbrush. Contacted the seller and they immediately sent me two new sticky tabs and toothpaste squeezer! Great great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Will M Kneeland

customer_reviews.title: Spacesaver
customer_reviews.text: I love this toothbrush holder, I have limited counter space so it works out great that I can hang it close to the sink. I hate those cups that I use to have to store my toothbrush in, the bottom of the cup inside would get moldy and now I don't have to worry about that anymore . I love that it has a dryer on it too. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! It was easy to stick on the wall and from what I can tell it does a great job sanitizing our toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: AlexisandSetheSmith

customer_reviews.title: this is something I always wanted
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and easy to use. Just charge it and you are good to go. The fan feature is smart. Although, the company says the charge can last upto 10 cycles but for me its going on for 18-20 cycles. Lucky me :-)
customer_reviews.author: AmP

customer_reviews.title: We love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase because my daughter accidentally slammed into it and broke the cover. I love that it dries and sanitizes the brushes. People think it’s cool when they come over lol. Totally worth it. Get it!!
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few days
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a few days then stopped working almost completely- won't hold a charge and will run for about 15 seconds and then shut off but this is only while it's plugged into the charger, when it's disconnected it won't run at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but stickers missing
customer_reviews.text: Used adhesive to attach to mirror, holds up fine. Been a few weeks, so far so good. It doesn't drip onto the counter (assuming fan and lights dry excess). I think they sent me the unit in the photos, but it didn't come with the decorative stickers to put on it like I thought it was going to.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgman, MI

customer_reviews.title: Toothbrushes aren't wet!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this one! I had one before but didn't have the fan! Our toothbrushes are not wet when we go to use them!! A big plus for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but the battery seems to die quickly. The flowers are a sticker so if you don't want them you don't have to have them. Also it should come with an extra set of stickies in case you need to move it. Other than that it seems to be working great
customer_reviews.author: Amy and Stevan Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Not the worst
customer_reviews.text: Holds my toothbrush just fine, doesnt seem to want to charge anymore already
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Hope it works
customer_reviews.text: We have it set up and found the uv light stays on even if you open the cover. The light was not very strong so can't really tell if this item is truly disenfecting the brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco90046

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Toothbrush and toothpaste out of the way and organized in this holder. Love it. Just make sure you install it where there is power supply. The device has to be charge at least once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: UV disinfection plus drying fan
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the smallest toothbrush holder I can find that has both UV light and a fan. The adhesive hook works well on my uneven wall. Holds both adults and kids toothbrushes well. When it is operating the fan does make some noise - doesn’t bother me as each session only runs for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Rabi

customer_reviews.title: Great easy product!
customer_reviews.text: We love the easiness of hanging up or toothbrushes. We have had a hard time with moldy cup/ toothbrush holders. This has fixed that problem. We really enjoy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Halford

customer_reviews.title: Get exactly what you pay for! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. I usually charge it once or sometimes twice a week. It last pretty long and we brush our teeth twice a day in our house. The design stick is simple and cute. When we travel to hotels I take it with us too.
customer_reviews.author: Sherice Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty much a piece of junk. The UV disinfecting light worked for about 2 weeks before failing.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Like very much
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a toothbrush disinfection tool long ago and saw that this UV toothbrush cleaner is suitable for home protection and is used to hold and keep the toothbrush clean. Place the brush head in the disinfectant, press the power button to start disinfection, and have a built-in fan to accelerate air flow. It will automatically turn off the power after disinfection is complete. I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Took me less than 5 minutes to install!! I like that I no longer have to worry about the sanitary of my toothbrush if someone leaves the toilet seat up this has it covered.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, it fit 5 toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: My family love this set so much with all that's going on. Especially during covid andthese germs. My kids loved watching the light and countdown as it sanitized greatproduct! Easy to put up. Fits 5 toothbrushes rushes. Small, compact, doesn't take up much space. Wall plug in but did not come with power block, just usb cord. UV light is excellent for killing germs, mold, and bacteria. I love that it holds toothbrushes while not in use and has a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how good the adhesive was so when I went to adjust it the plastic pieces snapped off. Now it leans when I take my toothbrush out as I was able to get it on one of the adhesive pads. Battery lasted about 3 days before it died. Wish I coud buy new adhesive pads to make it more secure.
customer_reviews.author: cady

customer_reviews.title: It does not stick on well.
customer_reviews.text: the product is awesome and works well. the only reason why i gave 4 stars is because the sticky tape does not stick for too long. I stuck it on my cabinet mirror and it fell off in about a week. However they do have screws included in the packet, i have not tried it yet, but if you use screws instead of sticky tape , it might hold on better.
customer_reviews.author: simple

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fan Drys Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact it has a fan to dry the brushes. The only issue I see it needs to be charged often which I don't know if it's a bad thing must be brushing a lot 😁
customer_reviews.author: Diane Wickwire

customer_reviews.title: 3 months old and will no longer charge
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all. Too late to return and can’t find a web presence for Sarnocare to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Evans

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month of use.
customer_reviews.text: For a month, it held up very well. My family and I used it frequently and my wife especially liked the UV light feature. Then one day I woke up to find the sanitizer had detached from the wall mount. It’s a relatively quick fix with some glue and elbow grease, I just wish it was a sturdier design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The cover hinge pin broke with less than a year of use. The seller responded quickly and replaced the unit without hassle. The seller was also interested in possible design improvements. On a side note, the latest version of this product had two attachment plates with adhesive only. I preferred the original single baseplate which had screws or adhesive to fasten to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: H. Kohls

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount to wall
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t come with an adapter to charge. Or it would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a sanitized taste on the tooth brushes and mouth. Other than that it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Kateennia

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have a family of four and looking for something that can keep our toothbrushes organize while sanitizing it. I am glad I found this and it works perfectly. Setup was easy and holds up. No issues so far. I think it is a very sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: geeta

customer_reviews.title: Not very adhesive
customer_reviews.text: After just a light touch, it's already fallen twice. Also, you're supposed to place the toothbrush with the bristles towards the back of the machine, but mine only fits sideways and the other brushes we have in there, my son's and my wife's, get turned on their sides when the door is closed. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A.

customer_reviews.title: Sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: The adhesion fell off the 1st day so I let it stay over night. And no problem since stays to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: DENITA  MCCOY

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: It went up easy and works very well. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this, but it only had the sanitizing part working on my toothbrush for about 10 minutes. I tried to hang it on my wall and their was no instructions, it ended up ripping paint of my wall and falling down with the things provided. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick to tile
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stick to tile had to get 3m take to get it to hold.... the door broke after a couple mths....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space saving- great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! Space saving! We usually keep the flap opened through out the day, only closed to sanitize once a day. No mold issues!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Very practical!
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely useful! I wish the toothpaste holder was a bit bigger because my full size tube of toothpaste doesn't fit... But other than that it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Good toothbrush sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about a year and a half. It works great. Fan dries toothbrushes. I do notice that I have to charge it more frequently now. Not sure if if will last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Paige White

customer_reviews.title: Had on cupboard door. Tooth brushes fell out easily.  Hook mount thing broke off.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad item. Just didn’t work for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: kacee

customer_reviews.title: Handy toothbrush cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids bathroom mainly to have some type of storage that would also keep them separate, the uv cleaning light was an added plus. The kids enjoy turning it on after every brush! At first, I didn't think it was working, but I found that the fan will start first; then after the fan, the uv light turns on. I had to buy my own double back tape, because the one that comes with it doesn't work (didn't hold), at least not on my mirror.
customer_reviews.author: SpecialK

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Love that it has a little fan as well!
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Shipping was fast and the product does what it says. Very easy to stick to the wall and have had it up for over a month with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I know why there are so many reviews. It is recommended as a satisfactory product.
customer_reviews.author: LEE

customer_reviews.title: Good durability
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing works perfectly well kids love it to easy to use and put together
customer_reviews.author: Ceecee

customer_reviews.title: Functional 👍
customer_reviews.text: I've been able to consolidate my toothbrushes into one area. I like that its small and compact for my small bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love love!
customer_reviews.text: Love love!! This is so easy to use and a great idea on keeping things clean when you have to store toothbrushes in a bathroom. We have 3 in our family and this works perfectly at holding/sanitizing all the toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Neat gadget for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great so far, easy to put up and set up. Does not need to be by an outlet to charge as there are hooks on the adhesive where the gadget can be taken off to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Garvey

customer_reviews.title: Low in quality
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t glue properly on the wall. Keep falling.very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: So far so food
customer_reviews.text: It was cery easy to install and stays on place. Timer for light and dryong fan

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way to store all of our toothbrush. The battery runs out quick but over all it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amina Ochirbat

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A must have to add a more germ free environment during these hard times.

customer_reviews.title: Sanitizing simplicity
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and sanitize at the press of a button

customer_reviews.title: Great product -- works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and works well. White has a nice modern look. Can't tell if the UV sanitation works but at least it dries the brush heads and keeps things tidy.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift tbh
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves it! It went up really easily and she said she is very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a UV toothbrush Holder for my son's toothbrush. So I was looking for a good thing. This product is perfect for me. It is what I was looking for! Especially I love the drying fan for toothbrush.
